text: Louie is a comedy-drama on the FX network that began in 2010. It is written, directed and produced by the stand-up comedian, Louis C.K.. He also plays in the show as the main character who has two children in New York City. The show is often seen as being very well-done and popular. Louis C.K. has also won Primetime Emmy Awards for his work on the show. == Other websites == * Official website * Louie on IMDb == References == Category:American comedy- drama television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Louie (TV series)
